Data.event_text: The six-century-old Gongchen Tower in Weishan, Yunnan is destroyed by a fire.
In Xinjiang, Chinese police kill six militants.

links.text: -"Police in China shoot dead six in restive Xinjiang". Thomson Reuters. January 12, 2015. Archived from the original on January 20, 2015. Retrieved July 5, 2021.-
-"Police in China shoot dead six in restive Xinjiang". Thomson Reuters. January 12, 2015. Archived from the original on January 20, 2015. Retrieved July 5, 2021.-

Data.event_text: Chinese prosecutors say that former top Chinese Communist Party official Su Rong is under investigation for alleged corruption.

links.text: -"China takes down senior leader amid anti-corruption campaign". Archived from the original on February 17, 2015. Retrieved February 17, 2015.-
-"China takes down senior leader amid anti-corruption campaign". Archived from the original on February 17, 2015. Retrieved February 17, 2015.-

Data.event_text: Chinese authorities also announce the indictment of former Guangdong official Zhu Mingguo, former Jinan CPC party chief Wang Min, and former Taiyuan party chief Chen Chuanping, all on charges of corruption.

links.text: -"Senior Guangdong official Zhu Mingguo expelled from party over graft". February 17, 2015.-

Data.event_text: The municipal intermediate people's court for the eastern city of Dongying convicts Ni Fake, former Vice-Governor of Anhui in China, on charges of bribery and "amassing wealth of unclear origin", and sentences him to seventeen years in prison.

links.text: -"China jails former vice-governor as anti-corruption drive continues". TheGuardian.com. February 28, 2015.-

Data.event_text: The Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference removes disgraced senior official Ling Jihua from the office of vice-chairman and also strips him of his ordinary delegate status.

links.text: -"Top China advisory body CPPCC ousts former top Hu Jintao aide Ling Jihua". February 28, 2015. Archived from the original on March 2, 2015. Retrieved March 2, 2015.-
-"Top China advisory body CPPCC ousts former top Hu Jintao aide Ling Jihua". February 28, 2015. Archived from the original on March 2, 2015. Retrieved March 2, 2015.-

Data.event_text: At least two knife-wielding attackers injure nine people at a train station in Guangzhou. The police fatally shoot one of the suspects.

links.text: -"Knife attack at China train station leaves 9 injured". Associated Press. March 6, 2015. Archived from the original on March 8, 2015. Retrieved March 7, 2015.-
-"Knife attack at China train station leaves 9 injured". Associated Press. March 6, 2015. Archived from the original on March 8, 2015. Retrieved March 7, 2015.-

Data.event_text: Meeting between General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party Xi Jinping and Kuomintang Chairman Eric Chu in Beijing.
Chinese Wikipedia is blocked in China.

links.text: -"Chinese Wikipedia Blocked by Great Firewall – China Digital Times (CDT)". China Digital Times (CDT). May 20, 2015. Archived from the original on May 4, 2017. Retrieved May 4, 2017.-
-"Chinese Wikipedia Blocked by Great Firewall – China Digital Times (CDT)". China Digital Times (CDT). May 20, 2015. Archived from the original on May 4, 2017. Retrieved May 4, 2017.-

Data.event_text: The Dong Fang Zhi Xing capsizes on the Yangtze River in Jianli County, Hubei during severe weather.
International Olympic Committee selects Beijing as the host city of the 2022 Winter Olympics beating Almaty.

More than two explosions occurred within 30 seconds of each other at a container storage station at the Port of Tianjin in the Binhai New Area of Tianjin. Over 100 were killed and hundreds are injured. There were at least 700 tonnes of highly toxic sodium cyanide stored at the site. By , local authorities ordered an evacuation.

China's Victory over Japan Day 70th Anniversary Parade held in Beijing, the first military parade to commemorate Victory over Japan Day in the history of the People's Republic of China. Around 12,000 troops from the People's Liberation Army and more than 1,000 troops from 17 nations participated in the parade.
to 29  The Fifth Plenum of the 18th CPC National Congress held in Beijing. The plenum discusses about the thirteenth Five-year plans of China.

links.text: -"中共中央政治局召开会议 研究＂十三五＂规划问题". October 12, 2015.-

Data.event_text: Ma Ying-jeou and Xi Jinping met in Singapore, the first such meeting between the leaders of the two sides of the Taiwan Strait since the end of the Chinese Civil War.

links.text: -Hunt, Katie. "Leaders of China and Taiwan set for first talks since 1949 split". CNN. Archived from the original on November 7, 2015. Retrieved November 7, 2015.-
-Hunt, Katie. "Leaders of China and Taiwan set for first talks since 1949 split". CNN. Archived from the original on November 7, 2015. Retrieved November 7, 2015.-

Data.event_text: National Memorial Day commemorating the 78th anniversary of the Nanking Massacre
a landslide happened in Guangming New Industrial Zone, Shenzhen, Guangdong. It has caused 7 deaths and about 75 to be missing, 16 are hospitalized. It is reported as man-made accident.

links.text: -Guo Wentao (郭文涛). 深圳滑坡被认定为安全事故 深圳市委向社会致歉. Qianjiang Evening News. 163.com. Archived from the original on January 13, 2016. Retrieved December 26, 2015.-
-Guo Wentao (郭文涛). 深圳滑坡被认定为安全事故 深圳市委向社会致歉. Qianjiang Evening News. 163.com. Archived from the original on January 13, 2016. Retrieved December 26, 2015.-
